SELECT tsr.ocode from t001_sys_role tsr
left join t001_rel_role_debt trrd on tsr.sid = trrd.role_id left join t001_sys_debt tsd on trrd.debt_id = tsd.sid left join t001_rel_user_debt trud on tsd.sid = trud.debt_id
left join t001_rel_role_group trrg on tsr.sid = trrg.role_id left join t001_sys_ugroup tsug on trrg.group_id = tsug.sid left join t001_rel_user_group trug on tsd.sid = trug.group_id
left join t001_rel_role_post trrp on tsr.sid = trrp.role_id left join t001_sys_post tsp on trrp.post_id = tsp.sid and tsp.enabled = 1 left join t001_rel_user_post trup on tsp.sid = trup.post_id
left join t001_sys_user tsu on (tsu.sid = trud.uid or tsu.sid = trug.uid or tsu.sid = trup.uid)
tsr.enabled = 1 and tsu.sid = #{userId}
